text: 5.4: Mt 15.4; Ef 6.1-2; 1 T 2.3Maaŋ muuŋgip, mba mana rimgi mbik, ana tari gu nzɨgi ki, ndu mben kurkurav mbe suaŋv khaŋ mbe suaŋri. Nde fharav Fhe Bakɨme rɨmani nɨman muunga ŋaar khare, nde won ndegi gu ndegmbori, nzɨgi gum nzɨkmbigi ganɨri. Mbe mba tɨvara muunga, mbe fhum mbe garav, mbe nzuav ŋgarigi ŋaari, mbe nta ŋkarkarga. Fhe Bakɨme guigira mba khesharigi tɨva vuzvugi.
